00003 /*
00004  * main - start function for the model, setup global state space of model and
00005  *        init and run the simulation executive. 
00006  */
00007 void
00008 num_main(int argc, char **argv, char **env)
00009 {
00010         int      ndays;
00011 
00012         g_num_stats = tw_calloc(TW_LOC, "", 1, sizeof(num_statistics));
00013 
00014         // ensure endtime doesn't fall at midnight
00015         ndays = g_tw_ts_end / 86400;
00016         if(g_tw_ts_end - (ndays * 86400) == 0)
00017                 g_tw_ts_end += 1;
00018 
00019         // parse coommand line args
00020         num_setup_options(argc, argv);
00021 
00022         // read input files, create global data structures, etc
00023         num_init_scenario();
00024 }

00026 void
00027 num_md_final()
00028 {
00029         printf("\nNetwork User Model Final Statistics: \n");
00030         printf("\n");
00031         printf("\t%-50s %11d\n", "Max Network Population", g_num_max_users);
00032         printf("\t%-50s %11d\n", "Ttl Start Events", g_num_stats->s_nstart);
00033         printf("\t%-50s %11d\n", "Ttl Stop Events", g_num_stats->s_nstop);
00034         printf("\t%-50s %11d\n", "Ttl File Transfers", g_num_stats->s_nfiles);
00035         printf("\n");
00036 
00037         if (g_num_log_f)
00038                 fclose(g_num_log_f);
00039 }
